meaningMnemonic: The <radical>buddy</radical> <radical>building</radical> is in the next <kanji>county</kanji>. If it was in your county then it wouldn't be a buddy, it would be a neighbor. You're aware of this building, but they aren't that close, so they're just a buddy.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>county</kanji> is everything you can reach when shooting a <reading>gun</reading> (ぐん). If the bullet can't reach a building you know, it's a buddy building in another county.
